remarks: The positive irreducible elements of ` ZZ ` are the prime numbers.  This is an alternative way to define ` Prime ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Dec-2014.)  Obsolete version of ~ dfprm2 as of 10-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
prmirredOLD.1 $e |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) $.
prmirredOLD.2 $e |- I = ( Irred ` Z ) $.
dfprm2OLD $p |- Prime = ( NN i^i I ) $.
